data.comment: The match has started.
Man Utd attack but Marcus Rashford's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
Leicester are pushing forward but Jamie Vardy's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 3, Mike Dean awards Man Utd a goal kick.
Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Mike Dean signals a Man Utd throw-in in Leicester's half.
In the minute 6, Man Utd's Anthony Martial gets in a shot on goal at King Power Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Man Utd to take a throw-in in Leicester territory.
Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, In Leicester Leicester's Jamie Vardy is caught offside.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Leicester.
Mike Dean signals a throw-in for Leicester, close to Man Utd's area.
In the minute 13, Mike Dean blows against Man Utd's Marcus Rashford for offside.
In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Leicester in the half of Man Utd.
In the minute 15, Throw-in Man Utd.
Throw-in for Leicester in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Corner awarded to Leicester.
Free kick for Leicester in the half of Man Utd.
In the minute 21, Leicester's Youri Tielemans gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Man Utd defender.
Man Utd have a goal kick.
Leicester needs to be cautious. Man Utd have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 23, Man Utd take a 0-1 lead thanks to Marcus Rashford.
That's a fine assist from Bruno Fernandes.
Leicester have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 26, Leicester drives forward and Jamie Vardy gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Mike Dean awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
In the minute 31, Goal! Leicester go level at 1-1 through Harvey Barnes in Leicester.
James Maddison instrumental with a fine assist.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 34, Leicester have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Man Utd.
In the minute 37, In Leicester, Bruno Fernandes (Man Utd) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Leicester goal kick.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 39, Important block from the Man Utd defence as Marc Albrighton fires in a strike for Leicester.
In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
Can Man Utd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leicester's half?
In the minute 44, Mike Dean awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Man Utd to take a throw-in in Leicester territory.
Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Bruno Fernandes (Man Utd) gets a yellow card.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Leicester close to the penalty box.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Man Utd at King Power Stadium.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
Ball safe as Man Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 47, Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mike Dean signals a Man Utd throw-in in Leicester's half.
Throw-in for Leicester in the half of Man Utd.
In the minute 49, Throw-in Leicester.
Free kick for Leicester in the half of Man Utd.
Leicester drive upfield and James Maddison gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Man Utd defender.
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Mike Dean.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Man Utd.
In the minute 54, Man Utd make their first substitution with Paul Pogba replacing Daniel James.
In the minute 54, At King Power Stadium, James Maddison has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Mike Dean signals a Man Utd throw-in in Leicester's half.
Mike Dean awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Free kick Leicester.
Throw-in for Man Utd at King Power Stadium.
Corner awarded to Leicester.
In the minute 60, In Leicester Man Utd drive forward through Marcus Rashford. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Leicester, Anthony Martial of Man Utd is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 61, Anthony Martial for the away team is judged to be offside.
Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, The match at King Power Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Victor Lindelof, who is down injured.
Throw-in high up the field for Leicester in Leicester.
It seems as if Victor Lindelof is unable to continue. Axel Tuanzebe replaces him for the away team.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Leicester in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leicester.
Free kick for Man Utd in the half of Leicester.
In the minute 70, Man Utd surge into the attack at King Power Stadium but Harry Maguire’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Leicester goal kick.
Timothy Castagne is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 72, Man Utd have a goal kick.
Timothy Castagne has recovered and rejoins the match in Leicester.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 73, Marcus Rashford for Man Utd is whistled offside.
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Leicester is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, Mike Dean waits before resuming play because James Michael Justin for Leicester is still down.
The away team have replaced Anthony Martial with Edinson Cavani. This is the third substitution made today by Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.
Mike Dean signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 76, James Michael Justin for Leicester is back on the field again.
Man Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Bruno Fernandes gives Man Utd a 1-2 lead in Leicester.
In the minute 79, Great play from Edinson Cavani to set up the goal.
Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Free kick Leicester.
Throw-in Man Utd.
In the minute 81, Ayoze Perez is replacing Marc Albrighton for the home team.
Corner awarded to Leicester.
In the minute 84, Mike Dean signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
Goal! Jamie Vardy levels the match at 2-2.
Ayoze Perez with an assist there.
In the minute 87, Mike Dean signals a free kick to Man Utd.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of Leicester.
Throw-in high up the field for Man Utd in Leicester.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leicester's Ayoze Perez misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leicester.
Man Utd to take a throw-in in Leicester territory.
Mike Dean signals a throw-in for Man Utd, close to Leicester's area.
Man Utd drive forward but Marcus Rashford is judged offside.
The match has come to a close in Leicester. The final score is 2-2.
Onyinye Wilfred Ndidi for Leicester has been booked by Mike Dean and receives a first yellow card.
